DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare pharmacokinetics single oral administration 2 capsule YH14659 , fixed-dose combination clopidogrel aspirin develop Yuhan Corporation versus co-administration Plavix ( clopidogrel ) Astrix ( aspirin ) healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Pharmacokinetics YH14659 Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 20 year 55 year Weight : 50kg , within ±20 % ideal body weight Have history neither congenital chronic disease Have history abnormal symptom opinion result physical examination ( medical checkup ) Eligible subject acceptable medical history , physical examination , laboratory test , ECG screen period Subject sign write consent Have know allergy hypersensitivity antiplatelet agent Person hypotension ( SBP ≤ 100mmHg DBP ≤ 50mmHg ) hypertension ( SBP ≥ 150mmHg DBP ≥ 95mmHg ) , person whose pulse rate 45 100 minute Have follow abnormal finding diagnosis ; AST ALT > 1.25 time normal upper limit total bilirubin > 1.5 time normal upper limit high PT , aPPT , BT normal range PLT 180,000 350,000 Patients hemorrhage predisposition hemorrhage Have disease history stomach intestinal surgery resection would potentially alter absorption orally administer drug Have participate clinical study within 3 month prior first administration Have use prescription medication include anticoagulant , antiplatelet agent , thrombolytic drug Prostaglandin E1 agent within 2 week prior first administration overthecounter , nonprescription preparation within 1 week prior first administration Patients aspirin induce asthma ( AIA ) history AIA Subject judge ineligible principal investigator subinvestigator
